title: Nine-Year-Old Struck By Gunshots In Dallas
content:
Follow CBSDFW.COM: Facebook | Twitter
DALLAS (CBSDFW.COM) – Dallas police responded to a shooting at Ramona Avenue and E. Ledbetter Drive Sunday evening.
Officials said multiple gunshots were fired at a vehicle.
According to police, a nine-year-old child was inside the vehicle and was struck by the gunshots.
Police said the child was transported to Children’s Medical Center in good condition.
This is an ongoing investigation.
